list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a thick cloud of tiny water droplets suspended in the atmosphere at or near the earth's surface which obscures or restricts visibility (to a greater extent than mist; strictly, reducing visibility to below 1 km).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the collision occurred in thick fog
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Va chạm xảy ra trong sương mù dày đặc

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: something that obscures and confuses a situation or someone's thought processes.
the grass which grows in a field after a crop of hay has been taken.
(with reference to a glass surface) cover or become covered with steam.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: hot steam drifted about her, fogging up the window
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Hơi nước nóng trôi về cô, sương mù lên cửa sổ

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she stared at him, confusion fogging her brain
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô nhìn chằm chằm vào anh, nhầm lẫn não của cô

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: treat with something, especially an insecticide, in the form of a spray.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Winnipeg stopped fogging for mosquitoes three years ago
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Winnipeg dừng sương mù cho muỗi ba năm trước
